	var fso = new ActiveXObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject");
	var fo,r;
	if(!fso.FolderExists("[[CpPath]]/DEV")){
		fo = fso.CreateFolder("[[CpPath]]/DEV");
		r = "Folder has been created";
	}else{
		r = "Folder already exists";		
	}

	var fso = new ActiveXObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject");
	var fo2 = fso.GetFolder("[[CpPath]]/DEV");
	var fo = fso.GetFolder("[[CpPath]]");
		
	var fc = new Enumerator(fo.Files);	
	fc.moveFirst();
	var f;
	var count = 0;
	while(!fc.atEnd()){
		f = fc.item();
		if(f.Name=="undefined"){
			fc.moveNext();
			continue;
		}
		f.Copy(fo2.Path+"\\"+f.Name, true);
		count++;			
		fc.moveNext();
	}
	var r = count + " files copied";	
}}" HasError="[HasError]" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="383,503" InstructionList="[InstructionList]" IsSimulationEnabled="False" IsUIStep="False" IsValid="[IsValid]" IsWorkflow="False" OnResumeClearAmbientDataList="False" OnResumeClearTags="FormView,InstanceId,Bookmark,ParentWorkflowInstanceId,ParentServiceName,WebPage" UpdateAllOccurrences="False" /> <FlowStep.Next> <FlowStep x:Name="__ReferenceID2"> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <av:Point x:Key="ShapeLocation">1646,8.5</av:Point> <av:Size x:Key="ShapeSize">488,503</av:Size> <av:PointCollection x:Key="ConnectorLocation">1890,511.5 1890,541.5 1548.5,541.5 1548.5,601</av:PointCollection> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <uaba:DsfAssignActivity CurrentResult="{x:Null}" ExplicitDataList="{x:Null}" InputTransformation="{x:Null}" OnResumeKeepList="{x:Null}" ParentServiceName="{x:Null}" ParentWorkflowInstanceId="{x:Null}" ResultTransformation="{x:Null}" ServiceHost="{x:Null}" SimulationOutput="{x:Null}" Add="False" AmbientDataList="[AmbientDataList]" CreateBookmark="False" DatabindRecursive="False" DisplayName="Assign" FieldName="CopyFoldersToDEV" FieldValue="{}{{
	var fso = new ActiveXObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject");
	var fo2 = fso.GetFolder("[[CpPath]]/DEV");
	var fo = fso.GetFolder("[[CpPath]]");

	var fc = new Enumerator(fo.SubFolders);
	fc.moveFirst();
	var f,r;
	var count = 0;
	while(!fc.atEnd()){
		f = fc.item();		
		if(f.Name == "DEV" || f.Name == "STABLE" || f.Name =="undefined"){
			fc.moveNext();
			continue;
		}
		f.Copy(fo2.Path+"\\"+f.Name, true); 
		count++;
		fc.moveNext();
	}
	var r = count + " folders copied";

	var fso = new ActiveXObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject");
	var fo = fso.GetFolder("[[CpPath]]/STABLE");

	var fc = new Enumerator(fo.SubFolders);
	fc.moveFirst();
	var f,r;
	var count = 0;
	while(!fc.atEnd()){
		f = fc.item();		
		if(f.Name =="undefined"){
			fc.moveNext();
			continue;
		}
		if(f.Name == "css" || 
		 f.Name =="Plugins" || 
		 f.Name == "scripts" || 
		 f.Name == "Services" ||
		 f.Name == "Sources" ||
		 f.Name == "themes"){
			f.Delete();
			count++;
		}
		fc.moveNext();
	}
	var r = count + " folders deleted";

2368.5,1435</av:PointCollection> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <uaba:DsfAssignActivity CurrentResult="{x:Null}" ExplicitDataList="{x:Null}" InputTransformation="{x:Null}" OnResumeKeepList="{x:Null}" ParentServiceName="{x:Null}" ParentWorkflowInstanceId="{x:Null}" ResultTransformation="{x:Null}" ServiceHost="{x:Null}" SimulationOutput="{x:Null}" Add="False" AmbientDataList="[AmbientDataList]" CreateBookmark="False" DatabindRecursive="False" DisplayName="Assign" FieldName="DeleteSvnDir" FieldValue="{}{{
	var fso = new ActiveXObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject");
	var fo = fso.GetFolder("[[CpPath]]/STABLE");

	var fc = new Enumerator(fo.SubFolders);
	fc.moveFirst();
	var f,r;
	var count = 0;
	while(!fc.atEnd()){
		f = fc.item();		
		if(f.Name =="undefined"){
			fc.moveNext();
			continue;
		}
		if(f.Name == ".svn"){
			f.Delete();
			count++;
		}
		fc.moveNext();
	}
	var r = count + " folders deleted";
}}" HasError="[HasError]" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="383,518" InstructionList="[InstructionList]" IsSimulationEnabled="False" IsUIStep="False" IsValid="[IsValid]" IsWorkflow="False" OnResumeClearAmbientDataList="False" OnResumeClearTags="FormView,InstanceId,Bookmark,ParentWorkflowInstanceId,ParentServiceName,WebPage" UpdateAllOccurrences="False" /> <FlowStep.Next> <FlowStep x:Name="__ReferenceID12"> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <av:Point x:Key="ShapeLocation">2368.5,1131</av:Point> <av:Size x:Key="ShapeSize">488,608</av:Size> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <uaba:DsfAssignActivity CurrentResult="{x:Null}" ExplicitDataList="{x:Null}" InputTransformation="{x:Null}" OnResumeKeepList="{x:Null}" ParentServiceName="{x:Null}" ParentWorkflowInstanceId="{x:Null}" ResultTransformation="{x:Null}" ServiceHost="{x:Null}" SimulationOutput="{x:Null}" Add="False" AmbientDataList="[AmbientDataList]" CreateBookmark="False" DatabindRecursive="False" DisplayName="Assign" FieldName="CleanUp" FieldValue="{}{{
	var fso = new ActiveXObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject");
	var fo = fso.GetFolder("[[CpPath]]");

	var fc = new Enumerator(fo.SubFolders);
	fc.moveFirst();
	var f,r;
	var count = 0;
	while(!fc.atEnd()){
		f = fc.item();		
		if(f.Name =="undefined" || f.Name == "DEV" || f.Name == "STABLE"){
			fc.moveNext();
			continue;
		}
		f.Delete();
		count++;
		fc.moveNext();
	}
	fc = new Enumerator(fo.Files);
	fc.moveFirst();
	while(!fc.atEnd()){
		f = fc.item();		
		f.Delete();
		count++;
		fc.moveNext();
	}	
	var r = count + " folders and files deleted";

The workflow creates two directories in BuildRelease/ApplicationServer folder

1. Create DEV folder and copy the contents of ApplicationServer into
Dev.
2. Create STABLE folder and copy the contents of ApplicationServer into
STABLE.
3. Delete Subversion resources in STABLE folder.
4. Checkout trunk in STABLE folder.
5. Delete .svn directory
" /> </FlowStep> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID12</x:Reference> </Flowchart> </Activity>
